tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE permissions (
    token_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    resource_id UUID NOT NULL,
    permission_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    granted BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE permissions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT,
    type VARCHAR(50),
    access_level VARCHAR(50),
    token VARCHAR(100),
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE digital_assets (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(100),
    owner_id INT,
    creation_date DATE,
    asset_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE DigitalAssets (
    asset_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    asset_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    owner_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (owner_id) REFERENCES TokenizeUsers(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AccessControl (
    access_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    access_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES DigitalAssets(asset_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES TokenizeUsers(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE permissions (
    permission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    token_id INT NOT NULL,
    permission_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE assets (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    asset_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    asset_owner VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    asset_value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);
